name: luvw
description: A tiny dependency-free two-way data binding library

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && babel --no-babelrc --presets babel-preset-latest index.js -o dist/luvw.js
scripts.watch: mkdir -p dist && babel --no-babelrc --presets babel-preset-latest index.js -o dist/luvw.js --watch

author: AnqurVanillapy
